item.title: Architecture
item.description: This document explains the architecture of the OCM Kubernetes Controllers . The purpose of the controllers is to enable the automated deployment of components using Kubernetes and Flux.

item.title: Installation
item.description: To install the ocm-controller you can use the provided Helm chart from the ocm-controller GitHub project’s ./deploy folder. The Helm chart has also been uploaded to the GitHub container registry as OCI artifact and this is also the preferred way to install the ocm-controller.
